Reviewed 3 of 3 files at r1.
Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved, some commit checks failed.

---

*[src/core/lib/security/credentials/google_default/google_default_credentials.h, line 53 at r1](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15408#-LCevAjV6hZK7y2E7Do7:-LCevAjV6hZK7y2E7Do8:bo7htb8) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/28a0390fadf2380a29d5b581d5dd9b4c302b5dec/src/core/lib/security/credentials/google_default/google_default_credentials.h#L53)):*
> ```objc
> namespace internal {
> 
> grpc_channel_credentials* grpc_google_default_credentials_create_impl(
> ```

I propose a simpler API.  Have a static global variable that points to the function to call to determine if we are on GCE.  The default value will be `grpc_alts_is_running_on_gcp`.  Then have a single method to override that to point to a different function.  The test can set this to a local function, which can record whether or not it was called and can decide whether to return true based on the needs of the test.

---


*Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15408)*

I propose a simpler API. Have a static global variable that points to the function to call to determine if we are on GCE. The default value will be `grpc_alts_is_running_on_gcp`. Then have a single method to override that to point to a different function. The test can set this to a local function, which can record whether or not it was called and can decide whether to return true based on the needs of the test.
The code is revised. PTAL --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15408)*

Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved.

---

*[src/core/lib/security/credentials/google_default/google_default_credentials.h, line 48 at r3](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15408#-LCnUuXSBJxXvmfjiD8z:-LCnUuXSBJxXvmfjiD9-:b-w29xjq) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/43fc38915f4fd3e06abf33d591c12e5f0464e23b/src/core/lib/security/credentials/google_default/google_default_credentials.h#L48)):*
> ```objc
> } grpc_google_default_channel_credentials;
> 
> typedef bool (*grpc_gce_tenancy_checker)(void);
> ```

Please move this into the `grpc_core::internal` namespace below.

---

*[test/core/security/credentials_test.cc, line 125 at r3](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15408#-LCnVPXf3jJtuKFrTqns:-LCnVPXf3jJtuKFrTqnt:bbur33h) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/43fc38915f4fd3e06abf33d591c12e5f0464e23b/test/core/security/credentials_test.cc#L125)):*
> ```cpp
> static const char test_method[] = "ThisIsNotAMethod";
> 
> static bool test_is_on_gce = false;
> ```

Please add a comment like the following before this:

```
/* -- global state flags -- */
```

---

*[test/core/security/credentials_test.cc, line 125 at r3](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15408#-LCnVXfv3ArNJi-Q_8PX:-LCnVXfv3ArNJi-Q_8PY:b-j9zkm1) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/43fc38915f4fd3e06abf33d591c12e5f0464e23b/test/core/security/credentials_test.cc#L125)):*
> ```cpp
> static const char test_method[] = "ThisIsNotAMethod";
> 
> static bool test_is_on_gce = false;
> ```

Please use the prefix `g_` for global variable names.

---

*[test/core/security/credentials_test.cc, line 923 at r3](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15408#-LCnWdUSCR8l0UFP-pOe:-LCnWdUSCR8l0UFP-pOf:b-4u3tx1) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/43fc38915f4fd3e06abf33d591c12e5f0464e23b/test/core/security/credentials_test.cc#L923)):*
> ```cpp
> static bool test_gce_tenancy_checker(void) {
>   bool result =
>       test_gce_tenancy_checker_called ? !test_is_on_gce : test_is_on_gce;
> ```

Instead of changing the result based on whether we've already been called to make sure that we're not called again, I suggest just resetting `test_gce_tenancy_checker` to false in the test and then check that it's still false after the second call.

---

*[src/core/lib/security/credentials/google_default/google_default_credentials.cc, line 265 at r4](https://reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/15408#-LCo7cjT3p_wL69KV9xx:-LCo7cjU2fRi_5xv_MH2:b-1kaxwl) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/8f4835e0af11cac35adcb5df95ef0f26c0646024/src/core/lib/security/credentials/google_default/google_default_credentials.cc#L265)):*
> ```cpp
> 
> void set_gce_tenancy_checker_for_testing(
>     grpc_core::internal::grpc_gce_tenancy_checker checker) {
> ```

No need for `grpc_core::internal::` here, since this is already in that namespace.
